title: vidhi viTTa
sahitya:
vidhi viTTa vazhiyin satiyena manamE mati keTTu murugan tudi viTTu viDAdE


anupallavi

  midi paTTa puzhu pOl sidai paTTa pOdilum gati kiTTum avanadu padamE satamenrAl


caraNam    mAya prapancattil pEyenavE tIvinai minjavE konjamum nenjam anjAdE
tAyanaiya unnaittan sEyena aNaittiDa nEya sahAya gAngEyan tuNai tEDu
